Question: As vice-chairman, this person was in charge of the operational side of the commission.
Hints: Flags were flown at half-staff on the day of this person's funeral.
Use of this person's name, image, and famous quote caused him problems over the years.
This person left the Navy at age 22 on August 23, 1952, and became a Lieutenant, Junior Grade, in the U.S Naval Reserve.
